@DeepakSridhar You may need to look at lines 160-163 of TFLiteObjectDetectionAPIModel.java to ensure that the image input (pixelValue) is passed in the correctly - we configured this for portrait mode right now. It could be that switching i and j will work.

160 for (int i = 0; i < inputSize; ++i) {
161 for (int j = 0; j < inputSize; ++j) {
162 int pixelValue = intValues[i * inputSize + j];

Let us know once you test this.
